pages.text: parayuka: pulariyute raksitavineat nan saranam tetunnu
parayuka: manusyarute raksitavineat nan saranam tetunnu

manusyarilum jinnukalilum pettavar. #===================================================================== # # Quran Translation # Name: abdul hamid & parappur # Translator: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed and Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor # Language: Malayalam # ID: ml.abdulhameed # Last Update: April 2, 2012 # Source: Tanzil.net # #======================================================
